title: Currenc Group Inc. Announces CEO Transition
description: SINGAPORE, Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Currenc Group Inc. (Nasdaq: CURR) ('Currenc” or the 'Company”), a fintech pioneer empowering financial institutions worldwide with artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, today announced that Dr. Ronnie Hui has stepped down as Chief Executive Officer. Alex Kong, Currenc’s Founder and Executive Chairman, will assume the Chief Executive Officer position.

title: AI Priorities: Decision-Making Over Automation for Enterprises
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is primarily seen by large enterprises as a tool to improve decision-making rather than simply automate processes. This preference is based on insights from a 2025 survey of IT leaders, highlighting the value of AI in operations, finance, and customer service, despite certain barriers.
content: In a recent survey, large enterprises have identified artificial intelligence (AI) as a key enabler for improved decision-making processes, shifting focus away from its use purely as an automation tool, according to the business-to-business publicati... [632 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Priorities: Decision-Making Over Automation for Enterprises
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Australian lawyer apologizes for AI-generated errors in murder case
description: A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.
content:

title: How AI Is Set to Reshape the Workplace | Bloomberg Tech: Europe 8/15/2025
description:
From the job cuts at Microsoft and Salesforce to Meta's multi-billion dollar hiring spree, artificial intelligence's impact on the labor market is already being felt. But what about the longer-term effects on the jobs available? Meet the European innovators set to redefine the future of work with tools including life-like avatars to next-gen voice AI.
"Bloomberg Tech: Europe" spotlights the biggest names and trends shaping the region's technology ecosystem as the global competition heats up. This monthly, 30-minute magazine-style show features in-depth interviews with top technology leaders, as well as major investors and policymakers - giving you a compelling A to Z of the most consequential innovations, opportunities and challenges. (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Euan Blair: AI Transition Needs An 'All In' Approach
description: It's clear Artificial Intelligence will transform the way we work. But how should workers - and their employers - position for success? Euan Blair, the CEO of upskilling platform Multiverse, says the key is to go 'all in' on AI. Blair spoke to Tom Mackenzie on "Bloomberg Tech: Europe." (Source: Bloomberg)
